text: Developed full stack features on Java and Angular web app, allowing for large scale implementation of the AT&T Fiber Network infrastructure
Implemented NgRx within frontend for improved data storage, optimized service calling, and refactored component architecture to decrease page load times by 10-70%
Introduced Jasmine/Karma unit tests for new and existing code, increasing code coverage by 40%
Built new and improved existing API calls within microservices by using PostgreSQL and Spring Data JPA
Detected and implemented fixes for frontend secret key vulnerabilities, improving overall security in frontend framework
Automated sanity testing using the Robot framework, leading to 10% decreased defects in production

Executed design and functional stories based on CRD and Figma templates using Agile and React for Consumer e-Commerce team. Fixed style defects and added reporting to components for customer analysis on att.com site

Collaborated with clients to automate and migrate their data to cloud native technology through the Palantir platform using data pipelining and cleaning, PySpark, Spark SQL, and Typescript for the Network Engineering Operations team. This consolidated 12 apps into 2 and therefore increased workload efficiency
Delegated biweekly standups for our program director, and hosted informational diversity sessions locally and nationally as part of the DE&I committee
Graded student assignments, assisted as a lab aid, and supervised office hours for ~100 students in degree required Java OOP and CS Tools courses
Developed a new Update Account Information page using Java and Java Server Pages and solved server crashing bugs to improve application flow and usability
Converted Bash scripts to run on Linux to with team’s system change
Participated in network and computer engineering classes specific to the company’s networking devices dealing with their National Control Center’s air traffic management
